name: Dungeon Death
description:
Take on the role of one of the king's defenders! And go to the "Deadly Dungeon" filled with various monsters and bosses! Collect various artifacts and purchase items from a mysterious merchant! The goal is simple: in case of death, start over!



Each game party will be different from the previous one, but at the same time you will still go down deeper through the floors to find the lord of the dungeon and destroy him at the request of the king!



The game is a 2D roguelike platformer with many rooms, loot and bosses!
